name: DealDo!
description:
DealDO!

This is a game in which you have to save a friend and make an important decision. But it's not that simple. The reds are waiting for you on the way. You have a lot of gadgets to get rid of them. But is it necessary? You are waiting for:

-7 gadgets 

- 20+ levels

-puzzles

-shooting

-dangerous opponents

 This is my first game and I will be happy if you play.
